EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Recording and Handouts - Increase ROI with Your EMS Billing Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 21, 2011
Thanks for Your Interest in Our Webinar - Increasing Your ROI with Your EMS Billing Program
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=}} for your interest yesterday’s webinar. You can access the recording and handouts from the webinar using these links:
Recording Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/fxmwcwb
PPT Handout: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/2011_ROI-Webinar_Oct20.pdf
We hope that the information is useful and thank you for your interest! Please consider TriTech for your upcoming EMS software needs.
Check out other educational webinars here: http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
The TriTech Software Systems Team www.TriTechEMS.com
For more information about TriTech software: Contact us at 800-537-3927 Email us at sales@TriTech.com Or request a demo here: http://www.tritechems.com/Contact-Us/demo.asp
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
